Our paper “On the effect of word order on cross-lingual sentiment” won best paper award at SEPLN 2019! This work derives from Àlex R. Atrio’s Master’s thesis, which I was co-supervisor for. Àlex is now at HEIG-VD and EPFL in Switzerland doing his PhD. His first publication and already an award. Congrats!

Premio al mejor artículo On the Effect of Word Order on Cross-lingual Sentiment Analysis http://journal.sepln.org/sepln/ojs/ojs/index.php/pln/article/view/6091 #sepln2019 #NLProc

— SEPLN (@sepln) September 26, 2019
